raise-my-hand.kandashisfluidcanvas: You need the Fluid Canvas Module!

displayhand.name: Show Hand on Players List
displayhand.hint: A hand icon will be displayed in the players list.

showuinotification.name: Display UI Notification
showuinotification.hint: A UI notification will be displayed for all players.

makeuinotificationpermanent.name: Permanent UI Notification
makeuinotificationpermanent.hint: This will make the notification permanent. You will need to click on it do dismiss.

showuichatmessage.name: Show Chat Message
showuichatmessage.hint: A chat message will be displayed.

showimagechatmessage.name: Add Image to Chat Message
showimagechatmessage.hint: This will add an image to the chat message.

chatimagepath.name: Chat Image Path
chatimagepath.hint: You can set a path to the image displayed on the chat.

chatimagewidth.name: Chat Image Width
chatimagewidth.hint: You can set the size of the custom image or player avatar. It is %

chatmessageimageuserart.name: Replace Chat Image with Player Avatar
chatmessageimageuserart.hint: This will use the user avatar image as chat image instead of the default image.

playsound.name: Play Sound
playsound.hint: This will play a default sound.

warningsoundpath.name: Warning Sound Path
warningsoundpath.hint: You can set a path to a sound you prefer.

warningsoundvolume.name: Warning Sound Volume
warningsoundvolume.hint: You can set the volume for the warning sound. Use 0.1 for 10% of the volume. 0.6 for 60% of the volume.

shakescreen.name: Shake Screen
shakescreen.hint: This will shake the screen. THIS REQUIRES Fluid Canvas MODULE!
